title: Whole team gets disconnected from a game and can't rejoin.
body:
I'm in a team and during the loading screen, my game crashes... soon to be told that everyone else on my team messaged me saying their game crashed as well and we can't rejoin.

If I get a Leaver Buster warning for this... I swear.

EDIT: The game just ended 3 minutes after...

replies.body: Are you able to play games fine now?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=xozm309I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-14T01:43:19.486+0000)
>
> Are you able to play games fine now?

Yeah.
